dict.acceptation: 先生；（用于姓名前）爵士；（中小学生对男教师的称呼）先生；老师；

sent.orig: Meanfield theory and largescale numerical simulations are employed to analyze the threshold of the SIR model.
sent.trans: 利用平均场理论和大量的数值仿真分析SIR模型的传染临界值。

sent.orig: Here we designed a miniature coaxial-cavity using stepped impedance resonator (SIR) as resonator element.
sent.trans: 作者利用阶跃阻抗谐振器(SIR)作为谐振单元设计了一款小型化腔体梳状滤波器。

sent.orig: A new Capacitive-Gap-Coupled (CGC) band-pass filter based on SIR (Stepped Impedance Resonators) is presented.
sent.trans: 本文提出了一种新的基于SIR谐振器的微带电容间隙耦合(Capacitive-Gap-Coupled,CGC)带通滤波器结构。

sent.orig: Pulse Vaccination in the SIR epidemic model with vertical transmission is studied in this paper.
sent.trans: 研究了脉冲接种作用下的具有垂直传染的SIR传染病模型，得到了无病周期解的全局稳定性和基本再生数。

sent.orig: In second chapter, research the dynamics of a SIR model with diffusion terms.
sent.trans: 第二章中研究了具有扩散项的SIR模型的动力学。
